name: Dr. Ron Overberg
title: Spa, Fitness, Meditation retreat expert
description: Dr. Ron Overberg is a renowned expert in spa, fitness, and meditation retreats. With a Ph.D. in Holistic Wellness and certifications as a Yoga Instructor and Meditation Master, he brings a wealth of knowledge and experience to help you achieve balance in mind, body, and soul.
quotation: Achieving balance in mind, body, and soul is the key to holistic wellness.

name: Dr. Catherine Li
title: Pregnancy Pilates, Yoga & Body Balance Instructor
description: Dr. Catherine Li specializes in pregnancy Pilates, yoga, and body balance. With a background in Physical Therapy and certifications as a Pilates Trainer and Yoga Alliance Certified Instructor, she empowers expecting mothers to stay active and find balance during pregnancy.
quotation: Empowering expecting mothers to stay active and find balance during pregnancy.

name: Dr. Danial
title: Health, Bodybio & Biomedical Nutritionist
description: Dr. Danial is a seasoned Health, Bodybio, and Biomedical Nutritionist. With a Ph.D. in Nutritional Science and certifications as a Registered Dietitian and Certified Nutrition Specialist, he's dedicated to building a strong foundation of good health through personalized nutrition plans.
quotation: Nutrition is the foundation of good health; let's build a strong foundation together.

name: Aysha Siddika
title: Registered Dietitian and Nutritionist
description: Aysha Siddika is a dedicated Registered Dietitian and Nutritionist. With a Masters in Clinical Nutrition and certifications as a Sports Nutritionist and Holistic Health Practitioner, she believes that food is medicine and works with clients to make every meal count towards better health.
quotation: Food is medicine; let's make every meal count towards better health.
